name: Ladybug Quest
description: Ladybug Quest is a 3D, tile-based, action-platformer that sends players on a story-driven adventure following the journey of a Ladybug on a quest to save her colony! Hop and dodge your way through the enchanting environments, while immersing yourself in the riveting story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX 12 supported card. DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
